snippet: The payroll number of 211,000 new jobs last month made it more likely that the Fed would raise interest rates later this month.
abstract: Stock market climbs to biggest gain since early September, helped by strong monthly jobs report and OPEC's continuing its level of oil production.
lead_paragraph: The payroll number of 211,000 new jobs last month made it more likely that the Fed would raise interest rates later this month.

headline.main: Wall St. Is Strongly Higher After Solid Jobs Data
headline.print_headline: Jobs, Oil and Europe Drive a Market Rally
